english: Ten minutes later his vigil was rewarded .
chinese: 十分钟之后，他的守候终于有了收获。

english: I have an inspector and two officers waiting at the front door .
chinese: 我已派了一个巡官和两个警官守候在前门那里。

english: He opened the curtains and, settling comfortably on the sofa, waited .
chinese: 他把窗帘拉开，舒舒服服地在沙发里坐下，开始守候。

english: I watched you all safely out of the house one morning and left my name .
chinese: 有一天上午，我守候到你们的确全都出了门，便留下了我的名片。

english: He manifested the greatest eagerness to be upon deck to watch for sledge which had before appear .
chinese: 他显得迫不及待地想上甲板去，守候在那架曾露过面的雪橇。
守候造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Chaddy's supreme achievement had always been to be there, at hand, the faithful buffer, quick to render assistance when assistance was needed .
chinese: 查迪最大的功绩在于她是个忠于职守的解围人，她永远守候在旁，等到需要帮忙之时，她立即前来相助。

english: A woman is an inborn guardian of “ home ”
chinese: 一个女人天生就是一个“家”的守候者。

english: How shall i ever forget that dreadful vigil
chinese: 那可怖的整夜的守候我怎么能忘记？

english: The sun keeps watch lu linglong , a legendary figure
chinese: 太阳的守候吕玲珑和他的西部传奇

english: We stayed up till midnight to see the new year in
chinese: 我们守候到子夜，迎接新的一年。

english: Would you still wait for the chances to come
chinese: 也许，守候了多时，始终还是乌云密布。

english: Somewhere an angel is looking out for you , too
chinese: 在某处，有一位天使，也在守候着你。

english: The hunter watched for the hare to come out of the burrow
chinese: 猎人守候着兔子从洞里出来

english: The hunter watched for the hare to come out of the burrow
chinese: 猎人守候着兔子从洞里出来。

english: So then they waited for a steamboat
chinese: 这样，他们就在那儿守候着轮船开过来。
